Description: EXXOMOVE GmbH is a company focused on providing solutions for individuals with limited arm and hand mobility. Their core offerings include the BATEO Roboterarm, a robotic arm designed to assist with reaching and lifting, and the CARBONHAND, a bionic hand orthosis that provides additional strength and endurance for weak hands. These products target individuals with conditions such as Arthrogryposis multiplex congenita, high spinal cord injuries, and advanced muscular dystrophies, as well as those with general limitations in arm and hand function. EXXOMOVE aims to enhance independence and quality of life by enabling users to perform everyday tasks more easily. The BATEO is designed to be lightweight and easily integrated with existing wheelchair controls, while the CARBONHAND uses sensors and artificial tendons to augment grip strength. The company emphasizes the ease of use and intuitive control of their devices. They participate in various rehabilitation and assistive technology trade shows to showcase their products and offer demonstrations. The CARBONHAND has been the subject of multiple clinical studies demonstrating improvements in grip strength and hand functionality. EXXOMOVE's business model appears to involve direct sales and partnerships with distributors and therapists. They also offer consultations and product testing opportunities. The company highlights its commitment to providing reliable quality and service for both the Carbonhand and Bateo. Their stated goal is to provide smart solutions for arm and hand mobility, enabling a more self-determined life for their customers.
Sales Line: I was reviewing your innovative assistive devices aimed at enhancing independence for individuals with limited mobility, and it reminded me of another recent partner in healthcare technology. While focused on digital solutions for care facilities, they also serve clients prioritizing enhanced patient care, and together we significantly improved their sales outcomes. Would it be unreasonable to briefly discuss how we achieved this, and explore whether a similar result could benefit your team?
Key Resonating Themes: Targets individuals with limited mobility; Offers products that enhance independence and quality of life; Provides solutions for individuals with specific medical conditions like Arthrogryposis multiplex congenita and spinal cord injuries
Products/Services Offered: BATEO Roboterarm; CARBONHAND bionic hand orthosis
USP/Key Selling Points: Enhances independence and quality of life; Lightweight and easy to integrate with existing wheelchair controls (BATEO); Augments grip strength (CARBONHAND); Intuitive control; Clinically proven improvements in grip strength and hand functionality
Customer Target Segments: Individuals with limited arm and hand mobility; Individuals with Arthrogryposis multiplex congenita; Individuals with high spinal cord injuries; Individuals with advanced muscular dystrophies
Business Model: Direct sales and partnerships with distributors and therapists; consultations and product testing opportunities
Innovation Level Indicators: CARBONHAND uses sensors and artificial tendons to augment grip strength.
Website Clarity Notes: The summary clearly communicates the business model and target group.
